rules_text:
Enchant nonland permanent
Enchanted permanent is a Food artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life,” and it loses all other types and abilities. [i](If it was a creature, it’s no longer a creature.)[/i]
notes:
Changed name, added art
3MV —> 2MV — Creature turned into a food can still be used by a lot of effects in the set, so lower MV
